mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM.NEXTVAL, #{roomName}, #{limitCount}, DEFAULT, #{location}, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM SET STATUS ='N', CLOSURE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.ROOM_NAME,B.LOCATION FROM ROOM_RES A JOIN ROOM B ON (A.ROOM_NO=B.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY RES_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_RES VALUES( SEQ_RES.NEXTVAL, #{resDate}, #{staTime}, #{endTime}, #{resTitle}, #{resContent}, #{roomNo}, #{empNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.ROOM_NAME,C.EMP_NAME FROM ROOM_RES A JOIN ROOM B ON (A.ROOM_NO=B.ROOM_NO) JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON (A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO) WHERE A.STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY RES_DATE ASC
